name: Discord Rich Presence
description: Show the movie or series you're watching in Discord. This add-on requires you to have the Discord desktop app installed and running.

name: IMDB Tag
description: Add-on to create a catalog from a IMDB tag url.

name: IMDB List
description: Add-on to create a catalog from a IMDB list url.

name: IMDB Watchlist
description: Add-on to create a catalog from a IMDB watchlist url.
